      • getProperties

      • getBuildable

        Buildable getBuildable()

      • getDeps

        ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> getDeps()
        Returns:
        the set of rules that must be built before this rule. Normally, this matches the value of the deps argument for this build rule in the build file in which it was defined.

        However, there are special cases where other arguments pull in implicit dependencies (e.g., the keystore argument in android_binary). In these cases, the implicit dependencies are also included in the set returned by this method. The value of the original deps argument, as defined in the build file, must be accessed via a custom getter provided by the build rule.

      • getVisibilityPatterns

        ImmutableSet<BuildTargetPattern> getVisibilityPatterns()
        Returns:
        the value of the "visibility" attribute for this build rule

      • isVisibleTo

        boolean isVisibleTo(BuildTarget target)
        Returns:
        whether this build rule is visible to the build target or not

      • getInputs

        Iterable<Path> getInputs()
        Returns:
        the inputs needed to build this build rule

      • getRuleKey

        RuleKey getRuleKey()
        Returns:
        key based on the BuildRule's state, including the transitive closure of its dependencies' keys.

      • getRuleKeyWithoutDeps

        RuleKey getRuleKeyWithoutDeps()
        Normally, a RuleKey is a function of the RuleKey of each of its deps as well as that of its inputs. This returns a RuleKey that is a function of only its inputs, which can be used to determine whether the definition or inputs of the rule changed independent of changes to its [transitive] deps.
        Returns:
        a non-null RuleKey.

      • toString

        String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the same value as getFullyQualifiedName()
